eLCS_Timer module¶

Name: eLCS_Timer.py Authors: Ryan Urbanowicz - Written at Dartmouth College, Hanover, NH, USA Contact: ryan.j.urbanowicz@darmouth.edu Created: November 1, 2013 Description: Tracks and stores the run time of algorithm and some of it’s major components

algorithm published by Stewart Wilson (1995).

class eLCS_Timer.Timer[source]¶

Bases: object

reportTimes()[source]¶

Reports the time summaries for this run. Returns a string ready to be printed out.

returnGlobalTimer()[source]¶

Set the global end timer, call at very end of algorithm.

setTimerRestart(remakeFile)[source]¶

Sets all time values to the those previously evolved in the loaded popFile.
